title: Marinated Mozzarella, Cherry Tomato, and Basil Salad
full_text:
Marinated Mozzarella, Cherry Tomato, and Basil Salad
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
15 mins
Marinating Time
30 mins
Total
35 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/4
cup
extra-virgin olive oil
1/4
cup
chopped fresh basil leaves
1
pound
ciliegine mozzarella
(cherry-size
mozzarella balls
)
Kosher salt
and freshly
ground black pepper
, to taste
1
pint
cherry
or
grape tomatoes
3
tablespoons
balsamic vinegar
(regular, white, or golden)
Directions
Combine oil and basil in a bowl. Add the mozzarella and season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and let marinate at room temperature for at least 30 minutes (see note).
Serious Eats / Diana Chistruga
Add tomatoes and vinegar to the mozzarella and toss to combine. Season to taste with more salt and pepper if desired, and serve immediately.
Serious Eats / Diana Chistruga
Notes
We recommend marinating this salad at room temperature as storing it in the fridge will cause the mozzarella to firm up.
